DocAttribute.Name: MethodOfMeasurement
DocAttribute.Documentation:
Name of the method of measurement used to calculate the element quantity. The method of measurement attribute has to be made recognizable by further agreements.
> <font color="#FF0000" size="-1">IFC2x2 Addendum 1 change: The attribute has been changed to be optional </font>

DocAttribute.Name: Quantities
DocAttribute.Documentation: The individual quantities for the element, can be a set of length, area, volume, weight or count based quantities.
